sn47.27:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
sn47.27:1.4: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, asekho hoti”ti?
sn47.27:1.5: “Catunnam kho, avuso, satipatthananam samattam bhavitatta asekho hoti.
sn47.27:2.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.27:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.27:2.6: Imesam kho, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam samattam bhavitatta asekho hoti”ti.
